schema.title: ConnectedSourceDataJob
schema.description: Scheduling, data fetch, and ingestion configuration for automated jobs against a registered connected data source.

id.description: Previously called ResourceID or SRN which identifies this OSDU resource object without version.
id.title: Entity ID

kind.description: The schema identification for the OSDU resource object following the pattern {Namespace}:{Source}:{Type}:{VersionMajor}.{VersionMinor}.{VersionPatch}. The versioning scheme follows the semantic versioning, https://semver.org/.
kind.title: Entity Kind

version.description: The version number of this OSDU resource; set by the framework.
version.title: Version Number

acl.description: The access control tags associated with this entity.
acl.title: Access Control List

legal.description: The entity's legal tags and compliance status. The actual contents associated with the legal tags is managed by the Compliance Service.
legal.title: Legal Tags

tags.title: Tag Dictionary
tags.description: A generic dictionary of string keys mapping to string value. Only strings are permitted as keys and values.

createTime.description: Timestamp of the time at which initial version of this OSDU resource object was created. Set by the System. The value is a combined date-time string in ISO-8601 given in UTC.
createTime.title: Resource Object Creation DateTime

createUser.title: Resource Object Creation User Reference
createUser.description: The user reference, which created the first version of this resource object. Set by the System.

modifyTime.description: Timestamp of the time at which this version of the OSDU resource object was created. Set by the System. The value is a combined date-time string in ISO-8601 given in UTC.
modifyTime.title: Resource Object Version Creation DateTime

modifyUser.title: Resource Object Version Creation User Reference
modifyUser.description: The user reference, which created this version of this resource object. Set by the System.

ancestry.description: The links to data, which constitute the inputs, from which this record instance is derived.
ancestry.title: Ancestry

meta.description: The Frame of Reference meta data section linking the named properties to self-contained definitions.
meta.title: Frame of Reference Meta Data

Name.title: Name
Name.description: Descriptive label given to a scheduled job.
Name.example: TGS Gulf of Mexico Well Logs

ConnectedSourceRegistryEntryID.title: Registry Data Source ID
ConnectedSourceRegistryEntryID.description: ID reference of the parent Connected Source Registry Entry

ActiveIndicator.title: Job Active?
ActiveIndicator.description: Indicates if a scheduled job is active (will be executed) or not (won't be executed)

FetchKind.title: External Source schema
FetchKind.description: The data type/schema/kind of data being retrieved form the external source. The returned value should validate against the corresponding registered schema in the OSDU schema service.

Filter.title: Data filter
Filter.description: Filter applied to the data fetch request, using data members in the FetchKind schema.

ConnectedSourceDataPartitionID.title: Connected Source Data Partition ID
ConnectedSourceDataPartitionID.description: ID of the external partition containing the desired data

ScheduleUTC.title: Job schedule (CRON)
ScheduleUTC.description: Schedule this job should run on, in CRON format

OnIngestionDataPartitionID.title: Partition ID
OnIngestionDataPartitionID.description: Consumer partition the incoming data will be placed in.

Workflows.title: List of workflows
Workflows.description: DEPRECATED: Superseded by the contents of appropriate parameters in an ActivityTemplate instance identified by data.ActivityTemplateID. In earlier versions: List of workflows and their configuration used in this scheduled job

items.title: Workflow
items.description: A workflow configuration in the context of a scheduled job.

Tag.title: Tag
Tag.description: Tag given to a workflow category, such as Fetch, Ingest, Delivery

Handler.title: Handler
Handler.description: Allows creation of a specific handler DAG for the source type

Name.title: Parameter name
Name.description: Name of the parameter the handler expects

Value.title: Parameter value
Value.description: Value of the parameter the handler expects

Url.title: Endpoint
Url.description: Data source endpoint used in workflow

SecuritySchemeName.title: Security Scheme Name
SecuritySchemeName.description: Reference name for the security scheme in the ConnectedSourceRegistryEntry document this scheduled job belongs to.

OnIngestionLegalTags.title: List of legal tags used in ingestion
OnIngestionLegalTags.description: List of legal tags to be injected into the manifests of external data before ingestion

OnIngestionAcl.title: List of access control lists used in ingestion
OnIngestionAcl.description: List of access control lists (ACLs) to be injected into the manifests of external data before ingestion

LastSuccessfulRunDateUTC.title: Last successful run (UTC)
LastSuccessfulRunDateUTC.description: The last successful run date of the job (UTC)

LimitRecords.title: Limit Records
LimitRecords.description: The maximum number of records to be processed in this job.

FailedRecords.title: Failed Record List
FailedRecords.description: A temporary solution before these references are stored in a related, external record for scalability: The data type/schema/kind of data being retrieved form the external source. The failed records list which is retrieved from the external source.

OnIngestionSchemaAuthority.title: Target system schema authority
OnIngestionSchemaAuthority.description: Consumer schema authority for the incoming data will be placed in.

CreateTimeMax.title: Max Create/Update Time for Data Records
CreateTimeMax.description: The maximum create/update time for data records (UTC).
